Contact
=======

contact
-------

### Lakewood Township

Municipal Building   
231 3rd Street   
Lakewood, NJ 08701

732-364-2500

Monday-Friday   
9:00 AM- 5:00 PM

-- Select One --

Code Enforcement 

Community Development 

Department of Public Works 

Department of Registrar/Vital Statistics 

Economic Development 

Emergency Management 

Emergency Medical Services 

Engineering Department 

Finance & Tax 

Finance Department 

Fire Department 

Foreign Trade Zone #235 

Human Resources 

Industrial Commission Department of Economic Development 

Inspections / Construction 

Lakewood Development Corporation Urban Enterprise Zone 

Lakewood Township Government 

Municipal Court 

Municipal Manager 

Planning Board 

Police Department 

Purchasing Department 

Stormwater

Tax Collector 

Township Clerk

Contact

Township of Lakewood  
Municipal Building  
231 Third Street  
Lakewood, NJ 08701 [Contact Us](https://www.lakewoodnj.gov/contact "Contact Township of Lakewood")

Phone: [732.364.2500](tel:+17323642500)  
Hours: Mon-Fri 9AM-5PM
